name: Ilam Fenj Aviation Academy
about: Ilam Fenj Aviation Academy is a premier flight school dedicated to providing comprehensive and personalized aviation training. Located in a state-of-the-art facility, our academy offers a range of programs from private pilot licenses to commercial aviation certifications. With a fleet of modern aircraft, including Cessna 172s and Cirrus SR22s, and advanced simulators, our students receive hands-on training in a safe and supportive environment. Our experienced instructors, many of whom are industry veterans, ensure that each student receives tailored guidance and mentorship. We pride ourselves on our low student-to-instructor ratio, allowing for focused attention and accelerated learning. Ilam Fenj Aviation Academy is committed to equipping students with the skills and knowledge necessary to succeed in the aviation industry, and we invite you to join our community of aspiring pilots.
services: ["Pilot teacher training\nPassenger transport pilot training\nPersonal pilot training"]
